SEARCH
Package control

Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
control.AuthService
public class AuthService extends Object
AuthService is a service (control) class responsible for handling user authentication logic such as login, logout, and password changes.

  • Constructor Details

    • AuthService

      public AuthService(UserRepository userRepository)

  • Method Details

    • loginVerification

      public User loginVerification(String userId, String password)
      Logs in a user by verifying their ID and password. If successful, marks the user as logged in and returns the User object. Otherwise, returns null.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID provided during login
      password - the password provided during login
      Returns:
      the authenticated User, or null if authentication fails

    • logout

      public void logout(User user)
      Logs out the given user by delegating to the User entity's logout method.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to log out

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(User user, String newPwd)
      Allows a user to change their password. Delegates the password update to the User entity and then saves the change via the repository.
      Parameters:
      user - the logged-in user changing their password
      newPwd - the new password to set

    • setupPasswordFirstTime

      public void setupPasswordFirstTime(String userId, String newPwd)
      Sets up a user's password during first-time login.
      Parameters:
      userId - ID of the user whose password is being initialized
      newPwd - new password to persist

    • isStudentOrStaff

      public boolean isStudentOrStaff(String uid)
      Returns if an Id is associated with Student/Staff
      Parameters:
      uid - userId
      Returns:
      true if the ID belongs to a student or staff, else false

    • setupCompanyRepAccount

      public CompanyRepresentative setupCompanyRepAccount(String userId, String username, String password, String companyName, String department, String position)
      Creates a new company representative account and persists it to both in-memory storage and the backing CSV file.
      Parameters:
      userId - representative email/ID
      username - representative name
      password - initial password
      companyName - company name
      department - department name
      position - job position
      Returns:
      the created CompanyRepresentative
